Text: Texas General Cc Darren We are not able to find out July deal for TGLO in the system Can you look to see if you have a deal number for this month Thank you Joy
Texas New Mexico Cc Deal for HE shows mw TNP shows the El Paso model shows I believe tehy are correct Can you please tell me who is right and if they are please change this Thank you Joy

Re DMS Reliant Cc Thank you Virginia for your help Reliant just found these mws so this one is closed Joy Virginia CT PM To Mark CT cc Geir CT Jesse CT Joy NRON Subject DMS Reliant Dear Mark and Geir I ran the audit viewer for deal sale to Reliant and Mark Guzmans name came up as the person who added the strip for HE HE that means Mark or Geir As this is on the verge of a real time shift change and I can find no notes in either of your books regarding a sale to Reliant could you both please look in your logs and notes and at the Inc sheets and tell me who did the deal and who at Reliant you spoke to They are not showing this purchase from us Please also advise if the deal is in but under a different counterparty so that we can make proper changes When you respond to this email please be sure to Cc Joy Werner in Houston as this matter needs to be cleaned up ASAP Thanks Virginia
